document.discussion_title: Eight Years After Entering U.S., Michael Hill Still Fine-Tuning Approach
document.topic_text: Eight Years After Entering U.S., Michael Hill Still Fine-Tuning Approach I agree. Consumers aren’t interested in a brand that is just like everyone else “except a little bit better” yet that’s as high as some brands are aspiring to be–better. Link:
document.post: Eight Years After Entering U.S., Michael Hill Still Fine-Tuning Approach I agree. Consumers aren’t interested in a brand that is just like everyone else “except a little bit better” yet that’s as high as some brands are aspiring to be–better. Link:
